title: Upgrading Django (to 1.7)
summary:
Want to learn about Django 1.7 and how to upgrade Django? Are you
unclear on what the numbers 1.7 mean or how Django rolls out new
versions? Find upgrading daunting? Want to better keep up with changes
being made in Django? This talk is for you.

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/FOP4/
